summary:
Results-oriented professional with a strong background in supply chain management, team leadership, and process optimization. Throughout my career, I have consistently demonstrated a commitment to excellence, driving operational efficiencies, and delivering exceptional results.

As an experienced L3/L2 Team Leader, I have successfully led cross-functional teams of up to 32 individuals, ensuring adherence to Rules of Lean Manufacturing and Zero Waste policy. With a keen eye for identifying areas of improvement, I have implemented streamlined processes, developed work instructions, and trained team members to enhance productivity and quality standards.

My expertise extends to inventory control, order management, and continuous improvement initiatives. With a meticulous approach to maintaining inventory accuracy levels of over $150 million, I have consistently exceeded expectations and achieved 99.5% accuracy rates. Additionally, I have effectively managed the entire lifecycle of orders, from creation to final product delivery, leveraging my analytical skills to identify and resolve transactional issues.

Adept at fostering collaborative environments, I excel in driving cross-functional accountability and facilitating effective communication across diverse stakeholders. I have a proven track record of motivating teams, conducting training sessions, and promoting a culture of continuous learning and development.

Beyond my professional accomplishments, I am fluent in both English and Polish, enabling seamless communication in multicultural environments. In my leisure time, I enjoy powerlifting, photography, and carpentry, which reflect my passion for personal growth and creativity.

If you're seeking a dedicated and results-driven professional with a strong commitment to operational excellence, I invite you to connect and explore potential synergies.

profile_positions.description:
- Manage the end-to-end lifecycle of orders, ensuring accurate and timely transactional inputs.
 - Identify and resolve transactional order issues to maintain order integrity.
 - Demonstrate accountability and cross-functional coordination within the company's supply chain.
 - Continuously improve order management processes and systems in alignment with company policies.
 - Analyze data to derive insights and make informed decisions.
 - Employ a holistic approach to analyze business issues and implement comprehensive solutions.
profile_positions.title: Associate Order Specialist EMA region

profile_positions.description:
- Maintain inventory accuracy at 99.5% for stock worth over $150 million.
 - Investigate and rectify discrepancies in shipped and received materials.
 - Facilitate effective communication among stakeholders in the supply chain.
 - Identify and resolve Oracle system issues.
 - Streamline inventory processes, including cycle counts, adjustments, and reporting.
 - Develop and present innovative solutions to enhance stock accuracy and efficiency.
 - Analyze root causes of inventory discrepancies and implement corrective actions.
profile_positions.title: Warehouse Operator (Inventory Control Specialist)

profile_positions.description:
- Supervised and led a team of up to 32 individuals in compliance with Rules of Lean Manufacturing and Zero Waste policy.
 - Resolved operational issues and optimized work processes, ensuring efficient resource utilization.
 - Developed work instructions and documented procedures to streamline operations and eliminate waste.
 - Coordinated material handling, including receiving, inventory management, and outbound logistics, while adhering to project-specific requirements.
 - Provided comprehensive training on various systems and technologies to enhance team members' skill set.
 - Implemented continuous improvement initiatives, mapping and upgrading work procedures to achieve maximum productivity.
 - Ensured adherence to 5S principles and quality procedures within the organization.
 - Conducted Pacman verification based on Bill of Materials (BOM) and provided work instructions.
 - Motivated the team through daily stand-ups and organized one-on-one meetings to ensure high morale and productivity.
 - Facilitated cross-training opportunities to foster multi-skilled team members.
 - Maintained effective communication channels between Project Engineers, Order Specialists, and assembly/production teams.
profile_positions.title: L3/L2 Production Team Leader

profile_positions.description:
- Execute WMS transactions and perform mechanical assembly of racks.
 - Verify physical material against system records.
 - Integrate components and conduct quality audits before shipment.
profile_positions.title: Production Material Handler

profile_positions.description:
- Ensure operational excellence and adherence to procedures.
 - Assemble racks and perform meticulous cabling.
 - Train and mentor new employees.
 - Conduct quality audits and maintain a clean workspace.
 - Lead a team of up to 15 individuals.
profile_positions.title: Backup Team Lead Rack Assembly

profile_positions.description:
- Manage and oversee a team of up to 20 employees.
 - Train staff to enhance customer service and maximize profits.
 - Develop marketing campaigns to increase the restaurant's visibility.
 - Responsible for budgeting and cost control.
profile_positions.title: Supervisor of Waitresses, Restaurant "Pick 1"
